message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been designed to meet your specific needs. Given its value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what most people are willing to pay. However, considering your unique appreciation for this product, I'm offering it to you for $9500. This is a special deal tailored just for you, taking into account its significant worth to you at $10000. I hope we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us.
